about.title: About the party
about.intro: Petra's party is really taking shape! On April 18th at [time TBD] we're throwing a big celebration at De Walvis in Amsterdam.
about.text: We would love to celebrate this special moment with you! Come join us for an afternoon full of fun, delicious food and beautiful memories.
about.about_petra: As you know, Petra is always the one who's there for others — from charities to everyone around her. For her 60th birthday, we're turning the tables: this time, we're collecting something for her!
about.entertainment: We've arranged an amazing live band to make the evening extra special. This band usually plays on Vlieland and will bring wonderful covers all evening that we can dance to!
about.contribution_text: That's why we're asking everyone to contribute via the Tikkie link with your name mentioned.
about.gift_note: Of course, you can also bring a gift — that's equally welcome!
about.closing: Thank you for joining in. Together we'll give her a party that's truly her.

location.title: Location
location.carInfo: The venue is easily accessible by car, with plenty of free parking available.
location.transitInfo: The venue is approximately a 20-minute walk from Amsterdam Centraal. Also easily accessible by bus from the station.
